Network data contains nodes information and edges information, a social network map can help readers visually see information such as network structure and central nodes. There are lots of packages in R can draw a network map, such as igraph, ggraph, tinygraph, networkD3. A good layout can make the structure more clearly, this article introduce a method to custom nodes position in ggraph package. We refer to the following information:[ggraph document](https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/ggraph/ggraph.pdf),[ggraph network plot: specify node coordinates](https://stackoverflow.com/questions/42048671/ggraph-network-plot-specify-node-coordinates)


```{r}
rm(list=ls())
setwd('G:/项目/助研')
library(ggraph)
dat=data.frame()
```
